pages.text: $(li)The Stonecutter is a new block that adds more efficient crafts recipes for stones items.
$(li)If this block is placed near of a Villager without a job, it will be turned into a $(l:patchouli:villagers/mason)Mason$(/l).
$(li)Just insert the stone block that you want to transform inside, select the block that do you want and save it in your inventory.
